node.html:
• Led analytical market research on mobile app ecosystem, leveraging SQL and Python on AWS to process large scale datasets.
  • Designed and deployed a full data pipeline integrating statistical analysis, web scraping, Git, NLP, and unsupervised clustering.
  • Created data visualization dashboards and forecasting reports using Python based tools, enabling the marketing team to identify high ROI opportunities.
  • Collaborated with product and marketing teams to translate insights into strategic growth recommendations.
  • Built and maintained an AI-driven trend detection system, analyzing over 3,000 new apps monthly.

• Assisted in lectures and led machine learning tutorials, helping students apply concepts using Python.
  • Conducted office hours to address student questions and provide technical support.

• Collected data from new clients by conducting market research.
  • Created a new potential client database to support growth strategies.
  • Presented about the software services of the company to the clients.

• Delivered personalized customer service and product recommendations focused on data-driven sales.
  • Supported sales and marketing efforts through direct customer engagement.
  • Analyzed sales data to track performance and contribute to monthly sales strategy planning.
